# Change Request: CR-005

> Feature: FEATURE-008 (Workplace/Ideation)  
> Date: 01-28-2026  
> Status: Implemented  
> Classification: MODIFICATION

## Summary

Add copy URL functionality for file access in the Idea tree view.

## Requested Changes

1. **Copy URL Icon**: Add a "Copy URL" button next to the Edit button in the editor header when viewing a file
2. **File Rename Verification**: Confirm existing file rename functionality works as expected (already implemented)

## Impact Analysis

| Area | Impact | Notes |
|------|--------|-------|
| Backend | None | Uses existing `/api/file/content?path={path}` endpoint |
| Frontend | Small | Add copy button to editor header |
| Database | None | No data model changes |
| API | None | No new endpoints needed |

## Acceptance Criteria

- [x] AC-42: Copy URL icon appears next to Edit button in editor header
- [x] AC-43: Clicking copy URL copies file access URL to clipboard
- [x] AC-44: Toast notification confirms URL copied
- [x] AC-45: File rename button works in tree view for files

## Implementation

### Changes Made

1. **workplace.js** - Added Copy URL button to editor header:
   - Button with `bi-link-45deg` icon next to Edit button
   - `_copyFileUrl()` method copies URL to clipboard
   - Toast notification on success

### Files Modified

| File | Change |
|------|--------|
| `src/x_ipe/static/js/features/workplace.js` | Added copy URL button and handler |
| `x-ipe-docs/requirements/FEATURE-008/specification.md` | Updated to v1.5, added AC-42 to AC-45 |

## Version Impact

- Previous: v1.4
- New: v1.5
